title: League crashed my pc, Remake game into ban
body: Hey riot i've had two instances of playing league in the past week in which that whenever i'd join the match and load in, it'd instantly shut down my pc. The second instance gave me a queue ban 20 minute and im not having it. It was a remake because my computer took time to load and the twitch jungle on my team Had no smite to begin with. Can you please look into This and if you reply soon, are you able to remove the queue timer ban?

replies.body: We can't simply lift these LPQ's since they're designed to try and help players fix the underlying issues that caused the crash to begin with. If your entire pc is crashing from only League opening, I would first try turning on the low-spec mode in the client options and then possibly doing some general pc maintenance. Crashes like that can sometimes be caused by overheating, so I'd also take a look through the [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) as well.
